des: "After making your own ham salad you'll never buy it prepared again. I first tried adding cheese to ham salad when I had to stretch a small amount of ham to make sandwiches for my children's lunches. It worked and they loved it!"
ins:
In a food processor, combine the ham and celery; pulse until finely chopped. Add cheese and pulse until mixed.
Place mixture in a bowl and add the mayonnaise and mustard. Mix well; serve on sandwich or pita bread.
